name: Ticket Vendor
description:
Game 1 of the Public Transportation Trilogy

Be a Train Ticket Vendor!

Serve customers. Give cute characters the correct destination ticket.

Compute change. Return the correct denominations.

Earn a living. Save your wages for things like rent and groceries.

Featuring 13 actual train destinations in Metro Manila.

Perfect for kids learning subtraction, and adults wanting to keep their arithmetic sharp.
